mountains.name: Mount Everest
mountains.aboutMountain: Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world, standing at 8,848.86 meters (29,031.7 feet) above sea level. It is part of the Himalayas and is known for its extreme altitude and challenging climbing conditions.

mountains.name: K2
mountains.aboutMountain: K2 is the second-highest mountain in the world, standing at 8,611 meters (28,251 feet). It is known for its challenging climbing routes and severe weather conditions.

mountains.name: Kangchenjunga
mountains.aboutMountain: Kangchenjunga is the third-highest mountain in the world, with a height of 8,586 meters (28,169 feet). It is known for its stunning views and diverse ecosystems.

mountains.name: Lhotse
mountains.aboutMountain: Lhotse is the fourth-highest mountain in the world, standing at 8,516 meters (27,940 feet). It is known for its proximity to Mount Everest and its dramatic south face.

mountains.name: Makalu
mountains.aboutMountain: Makalu is the fifth-highest mountain in the world, standing at 8,485 meters (27,838 feet). It is known for its pyramid shape and difficult climbing conditions.

mountains.name: Cho Oyu
mountains.aboutMountain: Cho Oyu is the sixth-highest mountain in the world, at 8,188 meters (26,864 feet). It is considered one of the easier 8,000-meter peaks to climb.

mountains.name: Dhaulagiri
mountains.aboutMountain: Dhaulagiri is the seventh-highest mountain in the world, standing at 8,167 meters (26,795 feet). It is known for its dramatic scenery and remote location.

mountains.name: Manaslu
mountains.aboutMountain: Manaslu is the eighth-highest mountain in the world, with a height of 8,163 meters (26,781 feet). It is known for its cultural significance and challenging climbing conditions.

mountains.name: Nanga Parbat
mountains.aboutMountain: Nanga Parbat is the ninth-highest mountain in the world, standing at 8,126 meters (26,660 feet). It is known for its dramatic rise and dangerous climbing conditions.

mountains.name: Annapurna
mountains.aboutMountain: Annapurna is the tenth-highest mountain in the world, at 8,091 meters (26,545 feet). It is notorious for its difficult climbing conditions and high fatality rate.

forests.name: Great Smoky Mountains Forest
forests.famous_for: Most visited national park in the USA

rivers.name: Amazon River
rivers.famous_for: Largest river by discharge volume of water in the world

rivers.name: Yangtze River
rivers.famous_for: Longest river in Asia and third longest in the world

rivers.name: Mississippi River
rivers.famous_for: Second longest river in North America

rivers.name: Yenisei River
rivers.famous_for: Largest river system flowing to the Arctic Ocean

rivers.name: Yellow River (Huang He)
rivers.famous_for: Second longest river in China, known as the 'cradle of Chinese civilization'

rivers.name: Ob River
rivers.famous_for: Major river in western Siberia, one of the longest rivers in the world

rivers.name: Paraná River
rivers.famous_for: Second longest river in South America

rivers.name: Congo River
rivers.famous_for: Second longest river in Africa and the world's deepest river

rivers.name: Amur River
rivers.famous_for: Forming the border between the Russian Far East and Northeast China

nature.name: Grand Canyon
nature.reason_for_best_nature: Vast and breathtaking landscape with unique rock formations.
nature.famous_for: Stunning views, hiking trails, and geological significance.
nature.wonder_details: Over 277 miles long and up to a mile deep, showcasing millions of years of geological history.

nature.name: Great Barrier Reef
nature.reason_for_best_nature: Largest coral reef system in the world, home to diverse marine life.
nature.famous_for: Snorkeling, diving, and vibrant coral formations.
nature.wonder_details: Stretches over 1,400 miles and includes thousands of reefs and islands.

nature.name: Mount Everest
nature.reason_for_best_nature: Highest peak in the world, attracting adventurers and climbers.
nature.famous_for: Challenging climbs and breathtaking views from the summit.
nature.wonder_details: Rises to an elevation of 29,032 feet (8,848 meters).

nature.name: Amazon Rainforest
nature.reason_for_best_nature: Largest tropical rainforest, known for biodiversity.
nature.famous_for: Unique ecosystems, indigenous cultures, and extensive wildlife.
nature.wonder_details: Home to approximately 390 billion individual trees and countless species.

nature.name: Victoria Falls
nature.reason_for_best_nature: One of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world.
nature.famous_for: Stunning views and the roar of the falling water.
nature.wonder_details: Measured at 1,708 meters (5,604 ft) wide and 108 meters (354 ft) high.

nature.name: Northern Lights (Aurora Borealis)
nature.reason_for_best_nature: Natural light display caused by solar winds interacting with Earth's atmosphere.
nature.famous_for: Spectacular displays of color in the night sky.
nature.wonder_details: Visible in high-latitude regions, creating an ethereal atmosphere.

nature.name: Iguazu Falls
nature.reason_for_best_nature: One of the largest and most stunning waterfall systems in the world.
nature.wonder_details: Comprises approximately 275 individual falls along 1.7 miles.

nature.name: Halong Bay
nature.reason_for_best_nature: Famous for its emerald waters and thousands of limestone islands.
nature.famous_for: Stunning seascape and unique geological formations.
nature.wonder_details: A UNESCO World Heritage site, with over 1,600 islands and islets.

nature.name: Salar de Uyuni
nature.reason_for_best_nature: World's largest salt flat, creating a mirror effect during the rainy season.
nature.famous_for: Unique landscapes and stunning photography opportunities.
nature.wonder_details: Covers an area of over 10,582 square kilometers (4,086 sq mi).

nature.name: Yellowstone National Park
nature.reason_for_best_nature: First national park in the world, known for geothermal features.
nature.famous_for: Geysers, hot springs, and diverse wildlife.
nature.wonder_details: Home to the famous Old Faithful geyser and diverse ecosystems.

wonders.name: Great Wall of China
wonders.architecture: Stone, brick, tamped earth, wood, and other materials
wonders.purpose_of_built: Defense against invasions and raids from nomadic tribes

wonders.name: Taj Mahal
wonders.purpose_of_built: Tomb for Mumtaz Mahal, commissioned by Emperor Shah Jahan

affluents.name: Elon Musk
affluents.education: Bachelor of Arts/Science, University of Pennsylvania

affluents.name: Larry Ellison
affluents.education: University of Illinois (no degree), University of Chicago (no degree)

space_missions.name: Hubble Space Telescope
space_missions.purpose: Explore distant stars, galaxies, and other celestial phenomena.
space_missions.achievements: Provided stunning images of deep space and contributed to determining the universe's expansion rate.

space_missions.name: Space Shuttle
space_missions.purpose: Transport crew and cargo to low Earth orbit, repair satellites, and assemble the ISS.
space_missions.achievements: Deployed satellites, repaired the Hubble Telescope, and enabled ISS assembly.

space_missions.name: Apollo 10
space_missions.purpose: Test all lunar mission procedures without landing on the Moon.
space_missions.achievements: First mission to fly close to the Moon's surface.

space_missions.name: Apollo 11
space_missions.purpose: Land humans on the Moon and return them safely to Earth.
space_missions.achievements: First manned Moon landing; Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin walked on the Moon.

space_missions.name: Cassini-Huygens
space_missions.achievements: Discovered water jets on Enceladus and sent the Huygens probe to Titan.

space_missions.name: Chandrayaan-1
space_missions.purpose: Explore the Moon and search for water.
space_missions.achievements: Detected water molecules on the Moon's surface.

space_missions.name: James Webb Space Telescope
space_missions.purpose: Observe the first galaxies and stars formed after the Big Bang.
space_missions.achievements: Captured some of the most detailed images of distant galaxies.

space_missions.name: Voyager
space_missions.purpose: Explore outer planets and interstellar space.
space_missions.achievements: First spacecraft to enter interstellar space.

space_missions.name: International Space Station
space_missions.achievements: Supports international collaboration and scientific research.

space_missions.name: Venera
space_missions.achievements: First images from the surface of another planet (Venus).

airports.name: Singapore Changi Airport
airports.connectivity: Hub for Southeast Asia and beyond

airports.name: Zurich Airport
airports.connectivity: Hub for Swiss International Air Lines
